EmailTemplate.description: Rejected to Pricing checked then will send alert to OPROW created
EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity Proposal Rejection Alert
EmailTemplate.subject: Rejected back to pricing {!Opportunity_Proposal_Waiting__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Pricing Team,
The Government Sourcing team has rejected this OPROW and we are asking you to review, make corrections, or provide information, before we can begin our process. Please log on to Sales Force for details on the reason for rejection. Please contact the Sourcing Team member if there are any questions and also once the requested actions have been completed.
Thank you.
